stimulusHtml: A file is downloaded to a computer at a rate modeled by the differentiable function f(t), where t is the time in seconds since the start of the download and f(t) is measured in megabits per second. Which of the following is the best interpretation of f'(5) = 2.8 ?
choicesHtml: At time t = 5 seconds, the rate at which the file is downloaded to the computer is 2.8 megabits per second. (B) (C)(D)
At time t = 5 seconds, the rate at which the file is downloaded to the computer is increasing at a rate of 2.8 megabits per second per second.
